mapper.select:
SELECT D.MEMBER_ID, D.MEMBER_EMAIL, B.FUNDING_TITLE, A.REPORT_TITLE, A.REPORT_DATE, C.NUMBER_REPORTED, E.REPORT_RESP_STATUS, B.FUNDING_CODE FROM TBL_FUNDING_REPORT A JOIN TBL_FUNDING B ON (A.FUNDING_CODE = B.FUNDING_CODE) JOIN TBL_SELLER C ON (B.SELLER_CODE = C.SELLER_CODE) JOIN TBL_MEMBER D ON (C.MEMBER_CODE = D.MEMBER_CODE) JOIN TBL_FUNDING_REPORT E ON (E.REPORT_CODE = A.REPORT_CODE) WHERE E.REPORT_RESP_STATUS = 'N'
AND MEMBER_ID LIKE '%' || #{ searchValue } || '%'
ORDER BY REPORT_DATE ASC OFFSET #{startRow} -1 ROWS FETCH NEXT (#{endRow} - #{startRow} + 1) ROWS ONLY

SELECT D.MEMBER_ID, D.MEMBER_EMAIL, B.FUNDING_TITLE, F.ANSWERS_CONTENT, F.ANSWER_DATE, C.NUMBER_REPORTED, E.REPORT_RESP_STATUS FROM TBL_FUNDING_REPORT A JOIN TBL_FUNDING B ON (A.FUNDING_CODE = B.FUNDING_CODE) JOIN TBL_SELLER C ON (B.SELLER_CODE = C.SELLER_CODE) JOIN TBL_MEMBER D ON (C.MEMBER_CODE = D.MEMBER_CODE) JOIN TBL_FUNDING_REPORT E ON (E.REPORT_CODE = A.REPORT_CODE) JOIN TBL_REPORT_RESPONSE F ON (E.REPORT_CODE = F.REPORT_CODE) WHERE E.REPORT_RESP_STATUS = 'Y'
AND MEMBER_ID LIKE '%' || #{ searchValue } || '%'
ORDER BY ANSWER_DATE DESC OFFSET #{startRow} -1 ROWS FETCH NEXT (#{endRow} - #{startRow} + 1) ROWS ONLY

SELECT B.CONTACT_SUBJECT, B.CONTACT_DETAILS, B.DATE_CREATION_INQUIRY, A.ANSWER_DATE FROM TBL_ADMIN_QNA A RIGHT JOIN TBL_ADMIN_INQUIRIES B ON (A.INQUIRIES_CODE = B.INQUIRIES_CODE)
WHERE MEMBER_ID LIKE '%' || #{ searchValue } || '%'
ORDER BY DATE_CREATION_INQUIRY

SELECT count(*) FROM TBL_MEMBER A
WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{ searchValue }
SELECT MEMBER_CODE FROM TBL_SELLER WHERE SELLER_CODE = #{sellerCode}
SELECT FUNDING_CODE FROM TBL_FUNDING WHERE FUNDING_TITLE = #{choiceValue}
SELECT SELLER_CODE FROM TBL_FUNDING WHERE FUNDING_CODE = #{fundCode}
